author: markt
msg: Remove the Suffix interface and get the Parser to create a MehtodParameters object which allows a cleaner implementation.

author: markt
msg: Add a test case for the final part of the EL 2.2 implementation

author: stsp
msg: Add some short aliases for --very-long-options to facilitate interactive use.
I've somewhat arbitrarily picked options. If you still miss an alias
for a --very-long-option which gives you RSI please speak up.
Also, in the help text, prefix alias lists with "alias:" rather than
"aliases:". So far there has never been more than one alias for an option.
Also, sort the list of aliases so they appear in the same order

author: tabish
msg: Switch to using a temp queue, leaves broker clean when test completes.
